name: Fruit Salsa With Chipotle Puree
keywords: chipotle chilies, fruit, red bell pepper, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 cups pineapple, peach or nectarine, cut into 1/4-inch dice
1/2 cup red bell pepper, stemmed, seeded and cut into 1/4-inch dice
2 teaspoons pureed canned chipotle chilies in adobo

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine all the ingredients; let rest for at least 10 minutes and up to 1 hour. Serve with pork or dark-fleshed fish.
